description:

In the end we make her cum and cum hard, then lift her off the ground in a brutal category 5 suspension. Even Amber can't hold the position for long. All the bondage is done on screen.
title: Sexy Amber has her elbows bound together, ankles to neck, and endures foot caning, brutal orgasms.
